subtitle: A way for users to apply roles to themselves

description.text:
Button roles are the next evolution of reaction roles, using buttons to apply roles instead of emojis.

You can create a message using Wynem that has buttons on it that users can click to add and remove roles from themselves.
There are multiple different types of button role that you can create.

rows: The user can add and remove "normal" roles as they wish
Once a user has applied a "binding" role, it cannot be removed
Users can only have one "unique" role from a button role message at a time
